Detailed Description

Common interface for model objects, which can be changed.

Model changes are executed in two steps: begin and end. The caller can also put some flags and additional data to the update functions, to control the update logic.

Definition at line 18 of file IChangeable.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum istd::IChangeable::ChangeFlags
Enumerator:
CF_ACF_INTERNAL 

Internal ACF flag.

Indicate that internal update is done.

CF_MODEL 

Indicate that data model is changed.

CF_ABORTED 

Indicate, that update was aborted by user.

CF_DELEGATED 

Change flag indicate that this change was delegated (is indirect) for example from agregated object.

Reimplemented in iproc::ISupplier, imath::TFulcrumGridFunctionBase< Argument, Result, Fulcrums >, icomp::IRegistry, iprm::IParamsManager, icomp::IRegistryElement, idoc::IDocumentManager, icmpstr::IElementSelectionInfo, ibase::IMessageContainer, iprm::ISelectionConstraints, ibase::TContainer< ItemClass, ContainerClass >, ibase::TContainer< std::pair< istd::TSmartPtr< InterfaceClass >, std::string >, std::vector< std::pair< istd::TSmartPtr< InterfaceClass >, std::string > > >, iprm::ISelectionParam, iproc::CDelegatedProgressManager, iqt::CReflectedBitmapBase, i2d::IObject2d, icmpstr::IComponentNoteController, iprm::IOptionsManager, ibase::ICommandsProvider, iproc::IStateController, and imod::IUndoManager.

Definition at line 21 of file IChangeable.h.

enum istd::IChangeable::SupportedOperations

Flags for supported operations.

This flags can be combined.

Enumerator:
SO_OBSERVE 

Observing of this object via observer-observable pattern.

SO_COPY 

Copying from other object.

SO_CLONE 

Creating of copy of this object.

istd::IPolymorphic *  changeParamsPtr = 0

Starts the change transaction.

Note:
Please note that the changeFlags and changeParamsPtr must not be identical with the corresponded parameters in EndChanges().

EndChanges()
